column23: In most cases gender data are global while ethnicity data are US only. Note - data don't always sum because of rounding.
column24: Data for parent company - if no data

column23: Calculated from EEO-1, as HP only provide % ethnicity data for new hires.
Latest report only gives numbers for 'people of colour' as a general category, so we have not updated the ethnicity figures.
Ingram Micro has not provided a total overall % of women in its workforce, only a breakdown of women at each level. The figures selected represent middle management.
Latest data available is from early 2016. Possibly because Etsy has been undergoing a staff overhaul with massive redundancies.
Ethnicity data represent those on the boards of directors only.
